channel.title: Week-27 on Martin PROKS

item.title: Week 27 (30/06-04/07/2025)
item.description:
ðŸ‘¾ IT

  • Uv vuild backend hits the production (link).
  • Beautiful write-up on how to speed-up character occurrence in Python (link).

ðŸ”¬Science

  • Short write up on 2024 nobel price winners professors Hopfield and Hinton for their contribution in AI (link).
    • Interesting how Waddington landscape is portrayed in the article
  • Another milestone for personalized medicine, baby receives personalized CRISPR treatment to correct CPS1 mutation inherited from both parents (link) (link).
    • The mutation is fatal, inability to remove ammonia (side product when protein is broken down) from blood
  • Specific sound frequency can influence gene activity and modulate cell fate (link).
  • Unfortunate statistical mistakes in Sun et al., clearly explained by Lior Pachter (link).

ðŸ”— Links

  • Thoughts on writing PhD suing Typist (link).
    • spoiler alter: probably not yet as the product is not mature yet
  • Commentary of John Marioni on drug discovery with AI @ Roche(link).

ðŸ”§ Tools

  • shshemi/tabiew: TUI for the table formats
  • bluewave-labs/checkmate: self-hosted monitoring platform
  • keplergl/kepler.gl: Geospatial analysis tools
  • pyutils/line_profiler: Line by line profiling for Python
